headline: Assessing KKR After a 20% Decline in 2025 Amid Infrastructure Expansion News
summary: So, you're watching KKR stock and wondering: Is now the time to buy, hold, or step aside? You're definitely not alone. After rising a whopping 262% over the last five years and an impressive 149.9% in just the last three, KKR has caught the attention of both long-term believers and cautious newcomers alike. But, more recently, the story has changed a bit. The stock is down nearly 20% year-to-date and slipped another 2.5% last week. Those numbers can definitely set the stage for opportunity,...
